description:
Mr. Gab has been acting strangely all day. He`s talking about nothing but flowers, and flowers fill the classroom. It turns out he`s in love with the florist, Sacchan! He`s been going to the flower shop to see her every day, talking about flowers and buying them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガブハチ先生, また恋!?
